name: Baba Ganoush
description: Smoky roasted eggplant dip from the Middle East. Creamy tahini and garlic make it irresistible.

instructions.instruction: Pierce eggplants several times with a fork.
Char eggplants directly over gas flame or grill until skin is burnt and flesh is soft.
instructions.tip: Burnt skin gives smoky flavor - the secret.

instructions.instruction: Transfer to a bowl, cool 10 minutes.
Peel off charred skin, scoop out flesh.
Drain eggplant in strainer for 15 minutes.
Process eggplant, tahini, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt and cumin in food processor.
Transfer to serving plate, drizzle olive oil, sprinkle parsley, sumac and pomegranate seeds.

tips: Serve at room temperature, not cold.
storageInfo: Refrigerate 5 days. Bring to room temperature before serving.
servingSuggestion: Serve with fresh pita or vegetable sticks for dipping.
variations: Add chili for a spicy kick.
